1.content: First of all, choose your gender.
1.title: Gender?

choices: Keep Stinkfacing you, but stop farting
Stop Stinkfacesing you, but he find a way to fart in your face again
Stop Stinkfacesing you and do something else
11.content:
In the middle of the ring, waiting for your opponent, Rikishi, you can see all the people who shout the name "Rikishi". The song starts playing, and there is, your opponent, Rikishi. He is determined to win, and this is your first fight, he enters into the ring and the bell rings.
The fight begins.
Rikishi walks slowly towards you, you're scared ...
Quickly, he grabs you and throws you into the corner, you do not want to fall, you know what will happen, you turn around and you Rikishi's there, he begins to kick you, so you fall.
Just a few minutes and it's time for the Stinkface
He places his ass near your face, says, "Take a deep breath" and he begins to scrub your ass in your face. But stop, you think already finished, but is just beginning, you hear a fart coming from his ass, the sound was so loud that I hear all the public, the smell is horrible, you start to get dizzy.
Then Rikishi ...
11.title: Male

info.brief_description: You suddenly wake up in ring. But you are not alone...
info.description:
Your name is Mike and you are new guy in WWE.
This is your first match in World Wrestling Entertaiment and it just happens that unfortunately your first opponent will be Rikishi.

The story can go pretty far but heres some rules:
No sex
No other wrestlers (Yokozuna is ok).
You can go out of the ring but lets still try to keep it involved with arena.
You might guess its mostly about ass, but you can do something else too if you want.

Chapters might be rewarded if theyre good.
